title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.9 - Strength of rivets in shear
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.9 - Strength of rivets in shear

State Regulations
(a) In computing the ultimate strength of rivets in shear the following values in
pounds per square inch of the cross-sectional area of the rivet shank shall be
used: Iron rivets in single shear....... 38,000

Iron rivets in double shear....... 76,000

Steel rivets in single shear....... 44,000

Steel rivets in double shear....... 88,000
(b) The cross-sectional area shall be that of
the rivet shank after driving. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-10.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
